remarks: Sum of a family that is nonzero at at most one point.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) Obsolete version of ~ gsumpt as of 6-Jun-2019. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
gsumptOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumptOLD.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumptOLD.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) $.
gsumptOLD.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumptOLD.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. A ) $.
gsumptOLD.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsumptOLD.s $e |- ( ph -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) C_ { X } ) $.
gsumptOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) = ( F ` X ) ) $.
